Text: Sorry for lateness..  I had all 4 of my wisdom teeth removed yesterday so I've been out of commission.  Thanks for patience.
four at once? ouch!  hope your feeling better bruh
feel better!! And thank you for your hard work and dedication!! You are my Howard life-line!!
Feel better!! Thank you for all your hard work and dedication!! You are my Howard life-line!!

wow i remember when i had my wisdom teeth out glad i was put to sleep!
hope you heal fast and minimum displeasure wushdishmeen
thx for the up/load

j

All 4 out at once and 1 of them was impacted so they had to cut my gum open.  Surprisingly the actual extractions didn't hurt because I was numbed up like a mofo.

I refused the nitrous or any sort of anesthesia and made it through with just the numbing injections.  It's AFTERWARDS that sucks...my kitchen, bathrooms, and towels all covered in blood and it took an entire day to stop the bleeding.  I was just drooling and swallowing blood all day... gross.

The next day I woke up with swollen cheek on the side they had to cut and stitch the gum.  I was really sore.

They gave me a bunch of vicodin though so I've been popping those like candy and so I've been doing okay now.  High as fuck and sleeping late.

Todays show will be up in 15 mins!  SORRY
Hey wush no excuses! haha just kidding hope you`re feeling better buddy oh yeah thank you!
